divs: sighting detailsin bed, sound asleep, i was awakened by a strange low buzzing and the sensation of a line of electrical-type tingling moving across my leg, as if i were in an mri. no lights. the cat on my bed seemed unaware and he started purring which oddly imitated the sound i was hearing. the vibrations i felt contributed to the sound- i laid still and tried to focus on whether it was a slight earthquake temblor but nothing more occurred, and suddenly it was eerily quiet. i was too groggy to think quickly enough to jump up and run outside. i regret not having done so. i have seen two orange disc\orbs in my neighborhood in the past few months that have seemingly glided low over the rooftops. i strongly feel that this was another one and it was hovering over my house. it was not a fearful experience.
Summary: I think my house or neighborhood was being scanned.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Twin Falls
There were no other sightings in Twin Falls on or around January 27th 2012
